comments.html:
Ivan, it is not true in any case.
If you do not have "enable secret" in config - no need to run enable command in "action cli" (I've checked). Probably, it is the "best practice" to run enable command first.

And if you configure router from tftp or flash you do not need to run "config terminal" command :)
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: Well, if you configure "privilege level 15" on the VTY lines, you also don't need the "enable" command, but I would dare to guess that both practices are not appropriate beyond the boundaries of your lab ;)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
